author: chetanm
msg: OAK-2261 - Enable support for NodeType based indexing rules (WIP)
* Adapt IndexPlanner and LucenePropertyIndex to work IndexingRule
* Removed unused methods from IndexDefinition due to switch to IndexingRule
* Remove some of the PropertyRestriction evaluation in
LucenePropertyIndex#addNonFullTextConstraints as those are now managed via
Property index. Existing logic treated every property as string and also analyzed it
which might cause incorrect result with PropertyRestrictions

author: chetanm
msg: OAK-2261 - Enable support for NodeType based indexing rules (WIP)
Adding support for skipping pre configured fields from tokenization when indexed for fulltext
